title.bibl: Russkaya Pochta (Russian Post), Jan. 18, 1918. Two Lectures on Russia

div.bibl: Russkaya Pochta (Russian Post), Jan. 18, 1918. TWO LECTURES ON RUSSIA

body.p: On January 26, 1918, there will be given at the hall of Berg's School (corner Hoyne and Division) a lecture on the following subject: "Elements of the Russian Revolution." The lecture will begin at exactly 7:30 P. M.

On January 27, 1918, at 2:30 P.M., Hull House (Bowen Hall), another lecture will take place, "The Role of the Bolsheviki in the Russian Labor Movement." Dr. Rovin, the lecturer, has come specially to Chicago to give these two lectures.
The lectures are sponsored by the Russian branch of the Social-Democratic Party. Admission 10 cents.
